author: NyandaKun
comment: Hi there, here are all the list of eateries that are halal : 1. The flavors at the School of Info Tech (Level 2) - Muslim stall , western cuisine and ayam Penyet store 2. Canteen (not the one near the convention centre) at Engineering block (level 2) - Muslim stall . I’m not sure about the western stall (please do let me know) 3. McDonald’s , Subways 4. Bistro Lab - yes it’s halal.
